body_html:
Yes I have enough disk-space, still 270gb free space left. Also running the bazel command with only --genrule_strategy=standalone does not help, same error.

However, I noticed that the generated commands include /usr/bin/gcc to compile the code, and manually running this command failes. However, if I use /usr/bin/g++ the code does compile, without any errors w.r.t. the symbols.
body_text:
Yes I have enough disk-space, still 270gb free space left. Also running the bazel command with only --genrule_strategy=standalone does not help, same error.
However, I noticed that the generated commands include /usr/bin/gcc to compile the code, and manually running this command failes. However, if I use /usr/bin/g++ the code does compile, without any errors w.r.t. the symbols.
body: Yes I have enough disk-space, still 270gb free space left. Also running the bazel command with only --genrule_strategy=standalone does not help, same error. However, I noticed that the generated commands include /usr/bin/gcc to compile the code, and manually running this command failes. However, if I use /usr/bin/g++ the code does compile, without any errors w.r.t. the symbols.
